text: 9.3-4: FG 22.6; 26.12; 1 Ko 15.89.3-4: Mt 25.40Ana mba gavi kherav maaŋ suaŋgim, Sor mbaram mba gavi ndigap, Zerusarem thav, khavgia Damaskusan ndai. Ana Zerusarem tha nda vov, Damaskus ŋgun hɨr zav mbuavra thagim, vhava mbe tor vhekvhegi fara muuŋgiap buivar kegap, vhemkora zera zav, Sor ga shɨrav, za ana behuigi. Mba vhava ŋaar guigira havhargiap, Sor rɨmani ga shɨrigim, Sor won hoza thav kɨgira nɨɨaŋ ndarigi. Ana kɨgira nɨɨaŋ ndarav mbararagim, guma kamthooŋ mbe khaŋ ana nzuai, “Sor, Sor, ndu thaŋ nzuav nan farfagi?”
